description: The Nest Athena A10 BLACK is a shoulder bag designed for DSLR's with a standard lens attached. Also accommodates one extra lens and a range of camera accessories, such as memory cards, batteries and filters. Stylish case manufactured from superior waterproof twill and dual closers, a Duraflex™ buckle and YKK™ zips. Comes with padded shoulder strap and rain cover.
title: NEST WATERPROOF CAMERA SHOULDER BAG
